ad_sdk/com.adition.ad_sdk.api.services.event_listener/AdTrackingEventData

AdTrackingEventData

data class AdTrackingEventData(val event: AdTrackingEvent, val url: String) : Serializable

A data class that stores the URL and the tracking event associated with it.

An object of this class can be used for debugging within AdMetadata.trackingEvents. Since one AdTrackingEvent can have multiple related URLs, this data class helps to identify events and their associated URLs.

In general, you do not need to use this class, except debugging.
